entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 7 except plus 1 along the Strait.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7 except plus 1 along the Strait. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
